attributes.action: do something about the lethargy of the people of this nation which allows whether or not to give Bob Paisley a posthumous award becomes the most signed petition on this website.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Who was he? How long ago did he die? I'm afraid the abuse of the people of this nation by our political masters is much more important to our future than whether or not a long dessicated corpse should be honoured!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
